Event.name: Create_representation
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Creator</fen> produces a physical object which is to serve as a <fen>Representation</fen> of an actual or imagined entity or event, the <fen>Represented</fen>.
<ex><fex name="cre">Epstein</fex> saw the machine-man and <t>carved</t> <fex name="Represented">him</fex> <fex name="Material">in shiny metal</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="cre">Picasso</fex> <t>drew</t> <fex name="Represented">some violent looking birds</fex>.</ex>
<ex>Towards the end of his life, <fex name="Creator">Munch</fex> <t>painted</t> <fex name="Represented">himself</fex> <fex name="Depictive_of_represented">as a ghost</fex>.</ex>
<ex>Dan Grant was the model for Norman Rockwell when <fex name="Creator">the artist</fex> <t>painted</t> <fex name="Represented">him</fex> <fex name="Role">as "The Barefoot Boy"</fex> for a Depression-era Coca Cola calendar.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Place">There</fex> <fex name="Creator">the Finnish artist</fex> <t>sketched</t> <fex name="Represented">him</fex>, <fex name="Depictive">creating a stunning portrait</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Representation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity produced by the <fen>Creator</fen> to evoke in an audience the idea of the <fen>Represented</fen>.
<ex>The bell became famous after being <t>painted</t> by Jamie Wyeth <fex name="Representation">in his painting Bronze Age</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Creator
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An individual or individuals that bring the <fen>Representation</fen> into existence.
<ex>Since <fex name="Creator">Frans</fex> <t>photographed</t> them ten years ago the population has increased.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time at which a <fen>Representation</fen> is created. </def-root>

Arg.name: Represented
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity--which may be a thing, an action or a state--that is represented by the <fen>Representation</fen>.
<ex>When Nadar <t>photographed</t> <fex name="repd">her</fex>, Desbordes-Valmore was sixty-eight.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive_of_represented
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A characterization of the state in which the <fen>Represented</fen> entity is presented.
<ex>He <t>carved</t> St. Francis <fex name="Depictive_of_represented">tumbling around</fex>, and St. Thomas banging his fist on a table.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the event (or state) which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). It may indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Creator</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>deliberately</ment>, <ment>carefully</ment>).
<ex>She set up her plywood on saw horses and <fex name="man">carefully</fex> <t>drew</t> her mother.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Role
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies a <fen>Role</fen> that one of the role fillers of the current frame also fills in a background context, either generically or in some specific instance.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE describes the <fen>Creator</fen> as being in some state during the creation of the <fen>Representation</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Depictive">As a young man</fex> he <t>painted</t> Philip IV as a fashionable equestrian.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Material
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The physical <fen>Material</fen> that is used in the production of the <fen>Representation</fen>.
<ex>I <t>drew</t> him <fex name="Material">on a sheet of paper</fex> first.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An action that the <fen>Creator</fen> intends to accomplish by creating the <fen>Representation</fen>.
<ex>He also <t>photographed</t> them <fex name="Purpose">in order to form a composite girl for one end of the bench and a composite boy for the other end</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location in which the artist produces the representation.
<ex>I <t>drew</t> him <fex name="Place">at work</fex> a bunch of times, mainly for the amusement of the staff.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity used by the <fen>Creator</fen> to make a <fen>Representation</fen> of the <fen>Represented</fen> entity.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The action of the <fen>Creator</fen> that allows them to make a <fen>Representation</fen> of the <fen>Represented</fen> entity.</def-root>

Arg.name: Iterations
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Iterations</fen> is the number of times the <fen>Creator</fen> creates the representation.</def-root>

Arg.name: Reference
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A representation of the <fen>Represented</fen> which the <fen>Creator</fen> uses as a reference in the creation of the artwork. For instance, another piece of art, a photograph, or his/her memory.
<ex>She <t>painted</t> the portrait <fex name="Reference">from a series of photographs</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: paint.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: depict or produce with paint.

lexUnit.name: draw.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: create a likeness on a surface using lines

lexUnit.name: cast.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: create a representation of someone or something using a mould that is filled with a liquid that will soon harden
